description: End-to-end Purchase Management System to control and track the full procurement lifecycle from purchase requisition through RFQ/quotation evaluation, purchase order issuance, supplier confirmation, delivery/GRN, invoice processing, and payment closure. The primary workflow sheet captures sequential stages with planned vs actual dates and calculated delays, enabling SLA monitoring, accountability, and auditability.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register

columns.name: Serial No
columns.description: Sequential row number for internal tracking

columns.name: PRPO Reg ID
columns.description: Unique registration ID for the procurement case (primary key)

columns.name: CompanyEntity
columns.description: Legal entity or business unit raising the purchase

columns.name: Process Status
columns.description: Overall workflow status (e.g., Open/In Progress/On Hold/Closed/Cancelled)

columns.name: Current Stage No
columns.description: Current stage number in the workflow

columns.name: Current Owner
columns.description: Person/team currently responsible for next action

columns.name: Overall Delay Days
columns.description: Calculated overall delay based on final stage actual vs initial planned (or configured logic)

columns.name: Hold Flag
columns.description: Indicates if the case is on hold (Yes/No)

columns.name: Cancellation Flag
columns.description: Indicates if the case is cancelled (Yes/No)

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which goods/services are required

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total = Quantity * Estimated Unit Price

columns.name: Attachment Link PR Docs
columns.description: Link to PR attachments (specs, approvals, etc.)

columns.name: Rework Count
columns.description: Number of times PR was returned for correction

columns.name: Shortlisted Vendors List
columns.description: Comma-separated vendor codes/names or reference to vendor list

columns.name: Quotation Register Link
columns.description: Link to quotation register or folder

columns.name: Non-Compliance Notes
columns.description: Notes on missing documents or deviations

columns.name: Supplier Contact Person
columns.description: Supplier contact person for this order

columns.name: Payment Due Date
columns.description: Due date as per payment terms

columns.name: Final Variance Estimate vs Actual
columns.description: Variance between Estimated Total Value and Paid Amount (or PO Total Amount) as configured

stages.stage_description: User raises a purchase requisition with item/service details, quantity, budget/cost center, and required-by date.
PR is reviewed for completeness, budget availability, and approved as per approval matrix.
RFQ/RFP is prepared and issued to shortlisted vendors with scope, terms, and submission deadline.
Vendors submit quotations; submissions are logged and validated for completeness.
Evaluation of quotations against technical specs and commercial terms; scoring and recommendation prepared.
Negotiation and finalization of price, delivery, warranty, and contractual terms.
PO is created and issued to vendor with final terms, delivery schedule, and tax details.
Supplier acknowledges PO acceptance and confirms delivery schedule/dispatch plan.
Supplier dispatches goods/services; logistics and tracking details are recorded.
Goods are received, inspected, and GRN is posted; discrepancies are recorded and resolved.
Invoice is received and matched against PO and GRN; exceptions are resolved before posting.
Payment is approved and released as per payment terms; transaction references are recorded.
Procurement case is closed after payment and documentation completion; lessons learned captured.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the complete purchase lifecycle with sequential stages, planned/actual dates, and delay calculations.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Reference master for supplier onboarding and selection.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Reference master for goods/services items used in PR/PO.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: Reference master for departments used in PR routing and reporting.

sheets.name: Cost Center Master
sheets.description: Reference master for cost centers and budget mapping.

sheets.name: UOM Master
sheets.description: Reference master for units of measure.

sheets.name: Tax Master
sheets.description: Reference master for tax codes and rates.

sheets.name: Payment Terms Master
sheets.description: Reference master for payment terms used in PO and invoice/payment processing.

sheets.name: Incoterms Master
sheets.description: Reference master for delivery terms (Incoterms) used in PO.

sheets.name: Approval Matrix
sheets.description: Approval routing rules based on department, purchase type, and value thresholds.

sheets.name: Status  Dropdowns
sheets.description: Centralized dropdown values for consistent data entry across the system.

sheets.name: Document Register ImportDump
sheets.description: Optional import/dump sheet to log document links and metadata for PR/RFQ/PO/GRN/Invoice artifacts.
